DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare immunogenicity inactivate H5 influenza vaccine single dose subject previously vaccinate LAIV H5N2 naïve subject
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Priming Effects PLAI Vaccine Subsequent Response Inactivated H5N1 Vaccine
DOC.detailed_description: It non-randomized , open label study evaluate license OrniFlu® inactivated vaccine ( produce Microgen Russia ) give healthy adult volunteer participate double blind placebo-controlled study Protocol No . : GPO AVIAN FLU Vaccine-V02-2 Vaccine Trial Centre Department Clinical Tropical Medicine , Faculty Tropical Medicine , Mahidol University February May 2013 . A total 60 subject , 40 receive two dos LAIV H5N2 ( prime-boost group ) , 20 receive placebo ( control group ) previous study ask return clinic receive single dose inactivate H5 influenza vaccine . Total foloww 90 day .
DOC.criteria: Participated Phase II study Protocol No . : GPO AVIAN FLU VaccineV022 Healthy Age 1849 year old Having Thai ID card equivalent Anti HIV Negative All hematology , biochemistry urine analysis within normal range clinical significance ( high 1.5 time normal value without clinical find history physical examination ) Able read write sign write informed consent . Known history egg allergy Having recently influenza infection confirm H5 Receiving vaccination H5N1 History bronchial asthma History chronic lung diseases History chronic rhinitis History immunodeficiency state History immunosuppression < 6 month prior immunization History heavy smoking ( 5 pack per day ) History alcoholic ( pure drink 200 ml per day ) Acute infectious noninfectious disease ( within 2 week ) HIV positives The volunteer take immunoglobulin product blood transfusion past three month begin experiment Participation research study stop participant le 1 month Pregnancy plan become pregnant 60 day enrollment breast feed Poultry worker
